Subject: Major Incident Resolved: Network Connectivity Issue in Dubai Mall
--------------------------------------------------
            

 

Major Incident Resolved: Network Connectivity Issue in Dubai Mall

______________________________________________________________________________

Date: 30-09-2024
Time: 08:00 AM GST

Dear All,

We are pleased to inform you that the network outage at Dubai Mall has been resolved, and all stores are now successfully connected to the group Wi-Fi.

 Our technical teams have verified the resolution.

If you require any further assistance, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting the following link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cedc6d1b3556b45f63f5e08dce12196bd%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638632782153689094%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=xVgaza2H4zzbepE8FR4OCQfedAyDrI9WBItc9TbMRcg%3D&reserved=0> .

Alternatively, you can also reach out to us via WhatsApp at +971 48045755 or utilize the chatbot available on the support portal.

Thanks,

Chalhoub Tech.
